sentence.Network_en: Clay coats can be particularly important as inhibitors of later quartz cementation.

sentence.Network_en: To be able to relate the cementation of reservoirs to other events would be quite useful.

sentence.Network_en: Calcite cementation seens a possibility where lime grains or calcareous organisms are abundant.
